item.title: How to change the rate of thieving..?
item.dc:creator: @shapesnatch shapesnatch
item.description:
@shapesnatch wrote:

try searching for case 2562: in ur client.java

should look somethin like this

[code] case 2562:
TheifStall(“gem stall”, “and recieve 3m”, 60, 500 * playerLevel[17],
995, 3000000, 30, 0x340);
break;

    case 4878:
        TheifStall("scimitar stall", "and recieve 2m", 40,
                300 * playerLevel[17], 995, 2000000, 30, 0x340);
        break;

    case 4877:
        TheifStall("magic stall", "and recieve 1m", 20,
                125 * playerLevel[17], 995, 1000000, 30, 0x340);
        break;

    case 4876:
        TheifStall("general stall", "and recieve 500k", 1,
                70 * playerLevel[17], 995, 500000, 15, 0x340);
        break;

    case 2560:
        TheifStall("silk stall", "and recieve 9m", 99,
                20 * playerLevel[17], 995, 9000000, 30, 0x340);
        break;[/code]

change the number before *, thats the exp

Read full topic
